entry.title: It's amazing!
entry.content:
I have learned a lot from professor LiShanYou who has created HunDun University recently. I have watched the video about the revolution of cognition online from their office app - HunDun App which has released professor Li’s new course: The Revolution of cognition.

I’m very exicted about this course. It do really open a door for me to re-view the world. How it works? What’s the most basic rules of world running on it?

Professor Li has explained the most important key point is The first principle and everything in the world are ruled by very simple rules only about 2 or 3 rules from different domain including philosophy, physics, biology, cosmolgy.

It’s amzing. The complicated world is just ruled by very simle rules. It’s sound very crazy and unbelievable. The wonderful part from biology. Biology system is advanced by following very simple
principles (from Darwin): the first one is: Genetic Variation , the second one is: competition for existence. He has gave some simulated games and examples. They’re very interesting & amazing & incredible. For exmple: Game of life, colony of ants, colony of sardines.

Thank professor Li to open a compeletely new door to me to re-view, re-think of the world! It’s amzing and mean a lot for me!
entry.summary: I have learned a lot from profes

entry.title: a small accident
entry.content:
There was a traffic accident this morning. Fortunately it’s a small accident. A boy has scraped by

a tricycle electric car. The boy and his father got down from a overbrige and were passing a bicycle

lane. A middle-aged man drived a tricycle car very fast and just knocked the boy’s arm. The boy and his schoolbag were fall down on the road soon!

The little boy’s father was very angy and rage. He instantly pulled down the driver from tricycle car after it stopped. And slapped him hard across the face. The driver looked like very self-abuse and didn’t hit back.

When I got closed to see what happened to the boy, and found the boy’s arm got hurt. There are two red blocks on his left arm with a little blood. His mind looked normal and shouted “It’s too pain!”.

I did know what happened next… But fortunately it’s a small accident. In short, all of us need to take care when we pass through road and it’s every one’s duty to comply with the rules when your are a rider or driver.

entry.title: Writing every day from today
entry.content:
From the view of article of HeCaiTou which a famous people on Dedao App. I did’t subscribe his channel.

But I’m a fan of LuoZhengYu which I think his as my teacher and friend who will post sixty seconds audio records about their ideas, knowledge, experience and wisdom to their followers every day moring. And i have read his audio about writing this morning. HeCaiTou says that wring let you move you focus from lots of useless think to the real things. And it’s the most simple and easy way to experience the whole progress of the matter.

Today we’re all want to make money faster and faster, success faster and faster. Most of us want to become a million moneybags at one night. and our heart is swamped with lots of noise, informations.

And we should know think is always think forever if we don’t take action to do something. we need to pick up our pen , our keyboard to writing , to typing what you think. which let you high speed rolling
head down and let you finger to listen your ideas, your thoughts. It’s simple and easy, but it works.

I have learned english from Junior to today, but it still looks like i have’t got a big improved. Maybe the method is wrong. But after I have read HeCaiTou’s article and recent learning from LiXiaoLai, Maybe I have found the solution and do really understand the persistence is very important and practice it again and again is the best way to master a language , a skill, a way to think.

Let me rock with english from now! Just do it and keep at it forever!
entry.summary: From the view of article o

entry.title: 洛可可关于产品设计的分享
怎么写出100万级别阅读量的文案？
entry.content:
不要羡慕别人写的好文案，能有几百万的阅读量，因为人家有门道，下了大功夫，找对方法！

  • 用户关注自己相关的，反差大的信息
  • 如何把产品跟用户关注的东西绑定

90%营销人写文案前的第一个错误 - 李叫兽的好文
entry.summary: 不要羡慕别人写的好文案，能有几百万的阅读量，因为人家有门道，下了大功夫，找对方法！
